sources.name: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (%)- World Bank
sources.description:
Data published by World Bank- World Development Indicators (WDI)
Data publisher's source Inter-Parliamentary Union ( IPU )
Link http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SG.GEN.PARL.ZS?view=chart
Retrieved 2017-06-14

The 'proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments' is defined as the parliamentary seats in a single or lower chamber held by women

variables.name: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments
